d283bc858f27.title: What a complete load of BS from someone who neither understands the constitution nor apparently the…

paragraphs.text: What a complete load of BS from someone who neither understands the constitution nor apparently the english language. Emoluments are gifts from from foreign leaders not commerce. Goods or services sold during the ordinary course of business are not emoluments. Grow up your candidate lost, get over it.
